За сурвов против манов и так было не легко а теперь просто НЕВОЗМОЖНО. Дайте хоть немного баланса игре. Его никогда не было раньше но сейчас он аообще сломан. Люди которые не умели играть на манах - делают изи на -4 при 6 генах.С пасибо вам разрабы за такое ХОРОШЕЕ обновление. За манов скучно, за сурвов не возможно. Не советую к покупке. Они убили игру

Oyun iyi ama oyunu aldıktan sonra oyun içi katil ve kurbanlarda daha fazla para harcamanız gerek, dlclerle birlikte alındığında daha ucuza geliyor bu yüzden çok sıkıntı değil. Yaklaşık olarak 75/100 lira civarında bir harcama yaparsanız gerekli tüm karakterleri açmış olacaksınız. 
Gerçek parayla açmanız gereken katiller dışında da katiller var mesela Demogorgon'u parayla açmanız gerekirken Artist öyle değil (aynısı kurbanlar için de geçerli).
Öğrenmesi biraz zor oyuna başlamadan önce biraz öğretici video izlerseniz sizin için daha iyi olur.
Mui dibertido este juego es apasionante recomiendo a toda persona que lo juege

大哥我真的很喜欢这款游戏，屠夫适当加强真的也没意见！但这次更新更的这是什么玩意儿？人类治疗速度减也就罢了，钢筋铁骨谁重做的？还玩个p啊！您瞅瞅钢筋出来的那个动作，我真不知道那动作是在干什么，玩屠夫看了真的会笑。
现在屠夫根本不用考虑带一刀，纯一拖三和辣手屠夫就能把人拖死。治疗速度自行体会。
“不行换个平稳着陆？”“那我某些地图只能围着小山坡转了。F*！”

钢筋铁骨改的跟SB一样，我并不认为原钢筋铁骨对于屠夫玩家会带来很大影响。自疗修机削弱，医药箱成了必需品，屠夫带猪头，人类不带医疗箱的话你自摸半天屠夫过来等于白摸。人类被救下钩后自带怀表效果，看似这一改动针对了守尸的屠夫玩家，但实则不然，该守尸还守尸，加个怀表效果又能怎样？本来没改之前，一局四个人中就会至少两个人带怀表，根本无关紧要。再说可以等怀表效果结束了再攻击啊！或者可以攻击救人的人啊！反正现在人类自疗慢，修机也慢，作为屠夫有什么好担心的呢！真是一点B用没有！这游戏要这么改也就快凉了！此评论仅表达个人的一点看法，欢迎大家评论区交流。

If you main survivor, it's worth an uninstall after most recent update.

Edit (after digging deep and playing 1 more night): and what’s worse is that these simple minded killer mains and useless/least altruistic survivors are being trolls saying ‘survivors are just angry they can’t press E to win’ like the loss of dead hard was the only thing that changed last patch. Pull your heads in, the game is disgustingly bad for solo/two/even 3 person queuing now. Being trolls on every discussion thread, won’t trick survivors to stay around and fill your lobbies like lambs to the slaughter.

If you play this game as survivor, it will go like this;
- you’ll touch a generator for maybe 5-10 seconds at the start of the game
- until the killer comes over after having seen you with lethal pursuer
- you think, hey it’s not so bad, let’s get some boldness points in
- you’ll run and loop the killer a bit, and maybe even feel a little good about it
- you then realise no generators have been done
- you go down, lame, chase over
- you’ll then be hooked
- 3 yellow auras appear, wait no - only 2 auras
- you’ll quickly realise they have zero intent to find their way to you on your hook
- you see them crouch and look around a bit, maybe ones breaking a dull totem
- you’ll patiently wait until second stage sets in
- the third guy appears exiting a locker, there he is
- perhaps one or two of the other survivors have grown bored of whatever had been so important before
- they come over, yay, friends!
- you now see they have the killer in tow, shit
- probably best not unhook me right now guy, you think to yourself 
- they unhook you, okay, this is fine, surely he won’t go for me, I’ve done nothing wrong
- yeah nope he’s definitely coming at me, fuck
- you run for 6 seconds
- killer hits you. we’ll that sucks, I’m dead
- but wait, maybe he won’t pick me up?
- oh he’s picking me up
- annnnd I’m going on the hook…
- that’s cool. I’m dead now. 
- You click spectate
- you pan through some uninteresting game play of people hiding in lockers, or a Claudette hiding in a bush, maybe there’s someone rummaging through a chest in basement. 
- You can no longer bring yourself to watch
- you leave game, 5 generators still needing to be done. 

Next game
- A fresh start! this will be better! 
- You spawn in
- you see a generator
- generator is corrupted /sad face
- you walk all the way to find non-corrupted generator
-a generator appears at last
- you start to channel you inner mechanic and work away at your gen
- you notice a friendly face on the bottom left of you screen turn red!
- oh he’s injured, hope he can run the killer a bit mo-annndddd he’s dead, that’s cool
- I’m at 80% on this generator, I’ll go save him after this you think to yourself
- he screams as he’s hooked
- BAM! my generator has exploded! AND regressed 15%, well that’s shit
- proceeds to continue on generator
- another person gets injured, surely he can run the ki- annnd he’s dead also
- another scream, another hook, another explosion + generator regression
-Your next 5-10 minutes will continue to be like this, until you finally admit that there will be no completing 5 generators, there will be no opening of exit gates, you don’t get to pass go, and you don’t get to collect any $200. 

If you persevere, all your survivor games will continue to proceed like this, or have something just as bad, like a legion with thanataphobia, or a killer running devour hope knowing full well there’s zero time to do bones anymore.  

What’s even better is sometimes the killer will take pity upon the least threatening survivor, who simps and acts cute, pointing out the other survivors and waving the killer over, helping them find suitable victims (suitable of course being anyone but them). In return, they are awarded the highest honour a little simp pet can receive, a hatch escape. The killer is ok with this, he has broken them, they are pathetic, submissive, and breedable, and the life they will continue to lead is one to be pitied, not envied. 

I have uninstalled the game now. The aforementioned killer mains/broken submissive survivors will say ‘happy to see you go’ and good for them, happy to not be seeing you either anymore. My only hope is that enough people will also leave the game, and these losers will be stuck playing rock, paper, scissors to see which 4 will be the piggies in the middle while the killer has his fun with them in a custom lobby. The matchmaking playlists, just crickets hopefully.

Most recent update has ruined the experience for newer players. Escaping isn't possible unless you're an experienced survivor , and you've got a full party of friends you can communicate with. I gave it a good college try and set my worries aside, but even if a killer makes several mistakes, they still get an easy 2k. Only 4-man escapes I've been able to get were due to being let go by killers on purpose.
Have fun with the game.

fuck you bitch

The game is decent, although with the new patch feels a bit too survivor sided, let me explain why:
Every survivor, reguardless of how far you are away get a movement speed AND endurance on being unhooked, extended to roughly 15 seconds or longer with BT, I'll have to read the patches for exact timeframes, but yea, this one thing for the games I played with it as Wraith is just for no reason survivors having endurance while I was on the other side of the map just smacking a gen.
Why do survivors have a perk that allows them to get a 30+ second blind? And why (at least on reading the perk description) is it spammable to chain to effectively infinite blind? 
Dunno why, but it feels a lot like the new update was shaking the meta for the sake of shaking the meta, as it changed a lot of perks that didnt need to be changed or added features that didn't need to exist. I might come back if I play with friends or if a patch comes out undoing some of the features of it, and if any of ya want to ask what I mean throw a comment down and I'll do my best to answer.
Also, quick sidenote before the end: A lot of the perks in this game seem to have the sole purpose to counter certain actions instead of the devs just nerfing the actions.
Killers and Survivors this update just dont feel right, aside from all the survivor buffs pretty much all the meta perks got nerfed on both sides (Corrupt Intervention, Ruin, Pop, Barmbeque and farming, , Iron Will, Self Care, Dead Hard, Decisive to name a few). 

Some of the nerfs were needed, but others just seem random, like the exhastion clause of iron will is fine, but the percentage changes kinda kill it.

 - Just a killer main that wants the game to be more fun
- And a survivor main, bored to death with tunneling and camping
